Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To amend the Small Business Act to exempt the Small Business Administration and financial and lending institutions from liability under certain Federal environmental laws with respect to property when title or control of the property is acquired by the Administration or the financial or lending institution under the terms of a business or disaster loan.
short_title: Innocent Lender Liability Relief Act of 1990
subjects: Liability for toxic substances pollution damages

summary.text: Innocent Lender Liability Relief Act of 1990 - Amends the Small Business Act to exempt from liability under certain environmental laws the Small Business Administration (and any financial institution participating with it) with respect to: (1) pollution control facilities acquired as a result of loan defaults; and or (2) property acquired as a result of disaster loan defaults.

titles.title: Innocent Lender Liability Relief Act of 1990

To amend the Small Business Act to exempt the Small Business Administration and financial and lending institutions from liability under certain Federal environmental laws with respect to property when title or control of the property is acquired by the Administration or the financial or lending institution under the terms of a business or disaster loan.
